project_descr:
Communication Support to Humanitarian Assistance(for IDPs)
The outbreak of violence that began in April has led to the displacement of 145,000 people who have taken temporary refugee in camps scatterted around Dili.

outputs.output_descr: The project is to create an effective network of disseminating 2types of information in IDP camps in the absence of usual channels of communication: 1) information on health and sanitation issues, humanitarian assistance information and 2) news on the evolving situation, and to support in particular, the dissemination of information and messages generated by the Information Service Centre established within the Ministry of Labor and Community Reinsertion.
